responses.text: I'm the human form of the :100: emoji.
Sarge, with all due respect, I am gonna completely ignore everything you just said.

The English language can not fully capture the depth and complexity of my thoughts, 
 so I'm incorporating emojis into my speech to better express myself. Winky face.
A place where everybody knows your name is hell. You’re describing hell.
If I die, turn my tweets into a book.
I asked them if they wanted to embarrass you, and they instantly said yes.
Great, I'd like your $8-est bottle of wine, please.

I'm playing Kwazy Cupcakes, I’m hydrated as hell, and I’m listening to Sheryl Crow. 
I’ve got my own party going on.
Anyone over the age of six celebrating a birthday should go to hell.

Cool. Cool cool cool cool cool cool cool, 
no doubt no doubt no doubt no doubt.
